Damai Dengan 3 Sekuriti Hotel di Seminyak Bali, WN Australia Dilepaskan
03 Nov 2019, 16:55 by Aditya Mardiastuti
Jakarta - Scott James Harrison (40) akhirnya dilepaskan dari sel tahanan di Polsek Kuta, Badung, Bali. Alasannya warga negara (WN) Australia pemukul tiga sekuriti itu sudah berdamai dengan korbannya.
"Iya (dibebaskan dari tahanan), sudah berdamai dengan korban," kata Kanit Reskim Polsek Kuta, Iptu I Putu Ika Prabawa saat dimintai konfirmasi, Minggu (3/11/2019).
Harrison ditangkap pada Rabu (30/10) dini hari. Dia memukuli tiga sekuriti hotel, Cristofianus Abukun (51), Juplianus Hanu (26), dan Yeremias Hasu (37), di kawasan Seminyak, Bali.
Ketiganya dipukul saat membantu Harrison yang tengah mabuk turun dari taksi dan masuk ke area hotel. Harrison sempat ditahan dan menjadi tersangka dalam kasus pemukulan tersebut.
"(Korban) luka memar saja," ujar Iptu Ika.

(ams/zap)

Peaceful With 3 Hotel Security in Seminyak Bali, WN Australia Released
03 Nov 2019, 16:55 by Aditya Mardiastuti
Jakarta - Scott James Harrison (40) was finally released from a holding cell at Kuta Police Station, Badung, Bali. The reason is that an Australian citizen (WN) beater of three security has made peace with his victims.
"Yes (released from custody), has made peace with the victim," said Kanit Reskim Kuta Sector Police, Iptu I Putu Ika Prabawa when asked for confirmation, Sunday (3/11/2019).
Harrison was arrested on Wednesday (30/10) morning. He beat three hotel security staff, Cristofianus Abukun (51), Juplianus Hanu (26), and Yeremias Hasu (37), in Seminyak, Bali.
All three were beaten while helping Harrison, who was drunk, got out of a taxi and entered the hotel area. Harrison was arrested and became a suspect in the beating case.
"(Victim) just bruises," said Iptu Ika.
